titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. H. E. Read &c, Judgment
CWG5001

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Larue Circuit Court
May Term 1864
Commonwealth of Ky Plff
vs } Forfeited Recogonizance
H. E. Read &c Defts

The securities of H. E Read in his bail bond living in this county to wit, Saml, Wilson, & Wm. P. Turpin having been duly summoned and failing to appear, it is adjudged that the Plff recover of said Defts the sum of Two Hundred Dollars and her costs herein expended and may have execution &c and the remainder of this proceeding is continued for service of process on H. A. Coleman.

A copy attest.
Robt. D. Murray clk

Commonwealth of Ky
vs } judgt.
H. E. Read & cO. B. 6th 329
